@thomaskaine5 @businessinsider No way! I would not go to a gym, hair salon, bowling alley, restaurant, or a movie theater.

I like living and I am not seeking to get infected with COVID19; therefore, I will stay at home.

We need more testing and a vaccine.

#TrumpIsACompleteFailure
